content: Anyone coming to the Connectathon this weekend and open for a chat on the v2 to FHIR work? I'm going and interested in a discussion if there is interest.
We have a group from Mayo that would be interested as well.
Ralf: Welcome to table 11 where Brian, Nicolai and myself sit for the analytics track.
Ok, on my way. But I have only a minute... now...
Just talked to @Hans Buitendijk he asks we could meet for lunch. Would this fit you?
there is a "if" missing. Please insert it where appropriate ;-)
Sure. See you all in 20 minutes at lunch!

@Ralf Herzog We were unable to find you at lunch place, so a bunch of us brought our lunch back to table 11. Please feel free to join us, or if lunch is not a good time, we can potentially book a breakout session and discuss there.
